verses.text: “\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3478"\w* yourself \w in|strong="H3478"\w* bitter grief, daughter besieged \w by|strong="H3117"\w* soldiers. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall around \w you|strong="H3117"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* strike \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* face \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rod.

“Bethlehem \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Ephrathah, small \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* rule \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* family line goes \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* distant \w past|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* abandon Israel \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w its|strong="H5975"\w* enemies \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* labor \w gives|strong="H5975"\w* birth. \w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* survivors \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* reunited \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w people|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d*, \w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* exalted name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d Lord
d* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* live \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w security|strong="H7965"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* great, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* peace: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Assyria comes \w into|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w treads|strong="H1869"\w* \w on|strong="H7462"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* soil, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* raise \w up|strong="H7462"\w* \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* seven \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, eight leaders \w of|strong="H1366"\w* men.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shepherd Assyria \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nimrod \w with|strong="H3068"\w* bared blades. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Assyria, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* tread \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* borders.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w survivors|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* disbursed \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* dew \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* showers \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* grass, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* don’t wait \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w or|strong="H1471"\w* linger \w for|strong="H5971"\w* mortals.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* survivors \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* disbursed \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* many peoples, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forest, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sheep-folds, \w who|strong="H3605"\w*, \w when|strong="H3772"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* passes \w through|strong="H3027"\w*, pounces. \w He|strong="H3605"\w* savages \w his|strong="H3605"\w* prey. \w There|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* rescuer.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hand triumph \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* adversaries, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* day, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd*: “\w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* slaughter \w your|strong="H3605"\w* horses \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* midst, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* chariots.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* devastate \w the|strong="H3772"\w* cities \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* tear \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* fortresses.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* magic charms, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* soothsayers.

\w I|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* cut \w down|strong="H8045"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* idols \w and|strong="H5892"\w* sacred pillars, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w you|strong="H7130"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H5892"\w* worship any more \w the|strong="H7130"\w* work \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w your|strong="H7130"\w* hands.
\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* uproot \w your|strong="H8085"\w* sacred poles, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w destroy|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* idols.
In my wrath and my anger I will seek vengeance on the nations that ignore me.”
